Tote Bag Competition","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" aims to raise awareness for the daily challenges faced by the homeless community of Toronto during the harsh winter, by having competitors battle it out to create the most effective tote bag of donation items. Each participating group, individual, or organization crafts a tote bag by hand-picking items to include in the package, based on their assessment of the needs of homeless individuals in Toronto, and sends in their tote bag submission via video. Each submission is judged, and the winning participant will receive ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Eligibility","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The competition is open to all. A \"participant\" can be a single individual or group of individuals. A participant may also choose to enter as representatives of an organization (e.g. company, school, charity, student association or place of worship), provided that you have appropriate approval from the organization or group that you are representing.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Those interested in participating must register by contacting Blankets for T.O. (via email or social media) by ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"January 1st, 2023","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Competition Rules ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"To compete in the Tote Bag Competition, each participant must complete the following by the indicated deadlines.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"ordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Register for the competition","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Those interested in participating must register by contacting Blankets for T.O., via social media or email, by January 1st, 2023.","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Create a suitable care package that would help a homeless individual if donated to them. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The care package created should contain at most 20 items","marks":[{"type":"underline"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Items packaged together into a single kit can be considered as one item. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Ideally, all your items should fit inside a bag portable enough to be carried around by one person. We find that packages are practical if they can fit within a single tote bag.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For a chance at maximum points, your care package should include at least 5 items each beginning with a different letter from the word ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"HOMELESSNESS.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Example:","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Including","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"a","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" N","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"otebook, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"S","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"ocks, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"M","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"ittens, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"E","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"armuffs, and a ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"H","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"at would fulfill this condition.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Submit a brief video before February 20th, 2023 describing your completed care package to our judges. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The video must be no longer than 1 minute!","marks":[{"type":"underline"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/reel/CNOc75KBswI/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Here is an example of what we are looking for","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":". Longer submissions will lose points, so keep your video short and sweet. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The video must be submitted via email (","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"mailto:blanketsforto@gmail.com"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"blanketsforto@gmail.com","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"), or through our Google Form which will be posted closer to the deadline. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The video must include the following information:","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"An introduction of you or your group, and why you were motivated to participate in the competition.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A brief description of all items selected for your care package.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Try to be as creative as possible with the video! The judges will only have this video when they evaluate your submission.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Attend our Tote Bag Competition event at the University of Toronto Scarborough (UTSC) on February 24th, 2023.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At least one member from each participating individual/group must physically attend this in-person event.","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Participants located less than 1 hour away from the UTSC will be given the option to attend virtually instead, but they must contact us via email before February 20th, 2023 to be eligible for this accommodation.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Bring your Tote Bag that you made, so that Blankets for T.O. can donate them to the homeless.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The winner will be announced during this event. To be eligible to win the competition, the participating individual or group must be physically present at this event.","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Exception will be given to participants which have been granted the aforementioned accommodation to attend virtually.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"There will be pizza, games and an opportunity to mix & mingle with other participants.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The event will be open to the general public, including any members of the media.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Judging Criteria","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We want groups to express their creativity and thoughtfulness through their selection of items. Each entry is scored on five categories, each with 5 attainable points, and the category scores are summed to calculate a total score out of 25.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"ordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Item Quality ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"(0-5 points): Are the items of high durability? How long do they last? Are they protective against the elements? ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Criteria Compliance ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"(0-5 points): Do you have 5 items, each starting with a different letter from the word ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"HOMELESSNESS","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"?","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Creativity ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"(0-5 points)","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":": ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Has there been creative thought put into what items to include? Was there an item included that was not seen in other packages? ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Usefulness","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" (0-5 points): Will the chosen items be helpful to homeless individuals? Do the items alleviate a key necessity or address an important issue faced by the homeless community? ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Presentation ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"(0-5 points): What is the overall quality of the video? Are all items arranged and shown clearly?  ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We encourage participating groups to do some research into homeless issues and the conditions of homeless individuals in Toronto, so that they can guide their item choices with specific ideas and use cases in mind.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Prize","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The highest-scoring submission will win a $100 gift card, or item equivalent in value.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Questions and Contact Info","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Feel free to reach out to Blankets for T.O. via email or social media for any questions and inquiries about the Tote Bag Competition. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/contact"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Find our contact email and social media details here","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

childMarkdownRemark.html: The 2022-2023 Tote Bag Competition challenges participants to create the most effective care packages for donation to the homeless.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The 2022-2023 Tote Bag Competition challenges participants to create the most effective care packages for donation to the homeless.
